title: Beyond how terrible my name is...
body:
Hello! Has anyone else taken the survey offered by Riot?  

https://riotgames.ca1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_a2x6mkfeFyEAekB?account_id=35859422&env=NA&web_region=na&locale=en_US&app_name=LeagueClient&app_version=6525154-6525000&system_os=Windows-7.Service%20Pack%201&game_id=4125369457

What is this? There are four "questions". The first one has a period but is not a sentence. The remaining are but lack punctuation. I love you Riot, are you okay to drive?

replies.body:
It looks like this survey is for helping developers gauge player understanding with recent progression systems is all. It's meant to help them find areas where the systems are weak in either meeting player expectations or explaining how they work in the first place if I'm to understand it correctly.
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

I didn't even know about this survey! I decided to check it out and answer some questions. Their punctuation may be a little inconsistent, but at least it was clear and easy to read.

To anyone else who may be curious about it, you don't need to enter any personal information, and you can easily complete the survey in a few minutes.
